Nebulous, Inc. | Cryptocurrency/Distributed Systems development | INTERNS, ONSITE (Boston)

Position: Web developer/designer, Backend engineer

Nebulous is developing a cloud storage platform that allows users to rent out their hard drive space in exchange for cryptocurrency. Our backend is fairly mature, and we are now working on an Electron-based desktop UI. We are looking for a webdev to develop this UI full-time.

Experience with Electron/node.js is a plus, as is an eye for design. But far more important is a clear passion for programming, and a drive to expand and refine one's skill set with the goal of writing great code.

We are also looking for engineers to help us maintain and extend our backend, written in Golang. You'll be helping us patch bugs, improve test coverage, and implement new functionality. As above, the most important prerequisites are a love of programming and a desire to improve.

Learn more and contact us at http://siacoin.com/jobs.html
